ResourceHeader.Description: The Oersted repository contains a copy of the magnetic field data from the Compact Spherical Coil (CSC) Fluxgate Vector Magnetometer and Overhauser Effect Scalar Magnetometer (OESM).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Dr. Torsten Neubert; The European Space Agency; Danish Meteorological Institute (Denmark); Danish Ministry of Commerce (Denmark); Danish Ministry of Transportation (Denmark); Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales (France); National Aeronautics and Space Administration (United States); Danish Ministry of Science (Denmark); Danish Space Research Institute (Denmark)

AccessURL.Name: Virtual Magnetospheric Observatory
AccessURL.Description: Magnetic field data from the CSC and OESM magnetometers onboard the Oersted spacecraft.
